title: Suggestion for Thunderbird icons
content: I use Thunderbird for email and Edge for my browser. Unfortunately the icons for the two are so similar it's difficult to tell them apart. I'd like to suggest that Thunderbird/Mozilla allow users to substitute their own icons for the running programs if they don't want to use the default one.

title: connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.gmail.com failed
content:
Since more than a week I encounter problems in sending emails (receiving emails works fine). I always get following message: "connecting to Outgoing server (SMTP) smtp.gmail.com failed". So i finally uninstalled Thunderbird, and re-installed it this morning. But the issue remains. Windows 11 Thunderbird version 128.9.2esr (64 bit) outgoing server settings: server name: smtp.gmail.com, port 465, Authentication method: OAuth2, Connection security: SSL/TLS.

From what i gather, i dont seem to be the only one who is experiencing these problems recently. Please help?

title: hanging on "Host contacted, sending login information"
content:
hello,

Every once in a long while, it jumps up and asks for my password. I give the one that relates to the "xxx" email address above and it rejects it as incorrect. Can anyone help? I don't remember having this problem before. I am using TB 115.10.1 (64-bit) many thanks, filter feeder

title: My Message detected as spam [1747131339-578517] while repleying to existing thread
content:
Hello everybody, Lately I am getting this frustrating message, from time to time, while replying to an ongoing thread. Some times the issue is solved by removing images or links from the original recipient's signature (further down in the thread). Some other times though, I keep trying to find out what is the problem, deleting different parts of the previous emails on the thread, without any luck! Then I have to make my reply as a new separate message, which is just bad! This does not happen very often, and many times I happens only to one out of many of my replies in the same thread! Which really baffles me. Is this a bug?

Could somebody help me understand why this is happening? Is there a quick way to spot what and where exactly is the problem with my new email, so that I can remove or change the specific part and do my job?

Below you can see the error message I get: "Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Message detected as spam. [1747131339-578517].. Please check the message and try again."

Thank you all in advance

content:

title: No allow button on oauth window to access gmail account on account set up
content:
Hi. I am trying to set up thunderbird on a new travel computer using gmail accounts. I enter the username and password and press done and it brings me to a screen saying thunderbird wants to access your google account, telling me to press allow. But there is no allow button to push (see screen info below). I have changed my accessibility settings to see the full screen but there is still nothing. I can't do this without an allow button. Help!

Mozilla Thunderbird Email wants to access your Google Account undefined <redacted>@gmail.com This will allow Mozilla Thunderbird Email to: More info Read, compose, send, and permanently delete all your email from Gmail Click for more information More info See, edit, download, and permanently delete your contacts Click for more information More info See, edit, share, and permanently delete all the calendars you can access using Google Calendar Click for more information By clicking Allow, you allow this app and Google to use your information in accordance with their respective privacy policies. You can change this and other Account Permissions at any time.

title: Unable to transfer Thunderbird profile to new computer
content:
I am attempting to transfer my Thunderbird Profile from and old computer (call it "SOURCE") to a new computer ("TARGET"). I have tried everything prescribed in the documentation. It fails every time.

[1] I tried importing the ".Thunderbird\Profiles\xyz.default: folder from SOURCE to TARGET (Tools -> Import). It starts the import, but soon aborts with the incomprehensible message:

1747152229330 addons.xpi WARN Checking C:\Program Files\Mozilla Thunderbird\distribution\extensions for addons Found 0 public keys and 0 secret keys (0 protected, 0 unprotected) RNPLib.jsm:559:15 1747152229736 addons.xpi WARN Addon with ID thunderbird-compact-light@mozilla.org already installed, older version will be disabled 1747152229736 addons.xpi WARN Addon with ID thunderbird-compact-dark@mozilla.org already installed, older version will be disabled Uncaught NS_ERROR_ILLEGAL_VALUE: Component returned failure code: 0x80070057 (NS_ERROR_ILLEGAL_VALUE) [nsIWebProgress.addProgressListener] <anonymous> chrome://messenger/content/aboutMessage.js:119 aboutMessage.js:119 1747152289419 Toolkit.Telemetry WARN TelemetryStorage::_scanArchive - have seen this id before: e4a0732e-f511-4cb6-ba38-be42dbd2b48f, overwrite: false Uncaught (in promise) NS_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND: Component returned failure code: 0x80520012 (NS_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND) [nsIFile.copyTo] _recursivelyCopyMsgFolder resource:///modules/ThunderbirdProfileImporter.jsm:659 _importMailMessages resource:///modules/ThunderbirdProfileImporter.jsm:588 _importServersAndAccounts resource:///modules/ThunderbirdProfileImporter.jsm:248 2 ThunderbirdProfileImporter.jsm:659

I have tried importing over a network, and also after copying the whole Profile from SOURCE to TARGET first, in an intermediate work area.

[2] I can't Zip my Profile, it's 16GB.

[3] I tried manually copying the profile directly from SOURCE to TARGET's "C:\Users\myLoginID\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird\Profiles\". When I start Thunderbird, it only shows the first few email folders, the rest are missing.

I have used this procedure successfully many years ago between two other computers.

I am desperate, I put my trust in Thunderbird, and now I cannot move forward, my business is in jeopardy. My old computer has started failing, it's on its last legs, and could soon become unusable.

I contribute to Thunderbird every year, and am a strong supporter.
creator: pierre6

Il programma ha sempre funzionato correttamente , ma recentemente - senza aver fatto alcun aggiornamento nel del sistema operativo ne del client (configurato IMAP), non riesco a ricevere le pec anche quando sono sul server e, cioè, quando le trovo regolarmente accedendo web , nello specifico appena apro il rpgramma mi scarica correttamente tutte le pec in arrivo, ma dopo vari minuti se arriva una nuova pec non me la scarica in automatico (nonostante abbia attivato le seguenti opzioni nelle impostazioni "Controlla nuovi messaggi ogni 5 minuti" e "Consentire la notifica immediata da parte del server quando arriva un nuovo messaggio". In attesa di un vostro aiuto, cordiali saluti.

title: Thunderbird printing fails when remote content is blocked
content:
When I attempt to print an email that has remote content and I have blocked remote content, Thunderbird's print function fails. When printing with plain text it just hangs as the automatic content downloading notice pop-up spins trying to download alternates between 0 and 1 bytes. Changing the view to simple html or original html does not resolve the problem. When viewing in original html you can see the yellow warning banner stating "To protect your privacy Thunderbird has blocked remote content in this message."

I have blocked remote content through View --> unchecking "Display Attachment Inline"

under

Tools -> Settings -> Privacy & security --> unchecking "Allow remote content in message"

The solution of just allowing the content will not work since that open the security hole trying to be closed. Formerly this worked, it seems like something in a recent update gets the routine stuck in a loop as it will not allow printing if there is remote content. Thunderbird hangs and needs to be manually terminated. This appears to have stopped working in the last couple of months.


exceptions. To do this, go to Tools > Options > Privacy and check the box for "Allow remote content in messages".
creator: safebox7596
